ART Holdings (Amalgamated Regional Trading) bụ ụlọ ọrụ na Zimbabwe
Ọ bụ isi onye na-emepụta akwụkwọ, gụnyere ngwa akwụkwọ na ntụgharị anụ ahụ
Otu ụlọ ọrụ ART na-arụ ọrụ na Zimbabwe, Malawi na South Africa dum.
ART Group dị na Harare ma na-arụ ọrụ akwụkwọ na Mutare na Kadoma
Edepụtara ngwaahịa ya na Zimbabwe Stock Exchange ma bụrụ akụkụ nke ndekọ ngwaahịa ya bụ isi, Zimbabwe Industrial Index.
